name: MEMORICK S.A.P.I. DE C.V.
description: Operator of a photographer booking platform intended to connect travelers and local photographers. The company's platform offers vacation photo-shoot services, connecting tourists with local photographers at affordable prices, enabling tourists to ensure that they get their good pictures clicked and turn those memories into a souvenir.
